Windlord::

Windlord screamed while he avoided the misssile "This is annoying 
me!!!!"

He fired 2 missiles against Soundwave.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     The missile lands in front of him and knocks him backwards 
across the 
> ground.  "Ah, bloody hells.  (And yes I do mean all of them.)  This 
is 
> starting to get me annoyed."  He takes of into the air toward 
Unitron.  
> "LEAVE US THE HELL ALONE!!!!!"  He fires four shots with his left 
arm cannon 
> at Unitron.  With his right hand he draws his staff and leads with 
one of the 
> blades, attempting to impale Unitron.
